title: Hungary blocks €90 billion EU loan to Ukraine
summary_full: Foreign Minister Péter Szijjártó accused Kyiv of "blackmailing Hungary by halting oil transit in coordination with Brussels and the Hungarian opposition"
summary_public: Foreign Minister Péter Szijjártó accused Kyiv of "blackmailing Hungary by halting oil transit in coordination with Brussels and the Hungarian opposition"
